DOC.brief_title: Assess Safety Efficacy Individually Tailored Prophylaxis With Human-cl rhFVIII Patients With Severe Haemophilia A
DOC.criteria: Severe Haemophilia A ( FVIII : C < 1 % ) accord medical history Male patient > = 18 year Previous treatment FVIII concentrate ( regular prophylaxis good compliance ondemand treatment ) least 150 Exposure Days ( EDs ) Good documentation regard dose bleeding frequency 6 month precede study start Immunocompetence ( CD4+ count > 200/microliter ) HIVnegative , positive , viral load < 200 particles/microliter < 400,000 copies/mL Any coagulation disorder Haemophilia A Present past FVIII inhibitor activity ( > 0.6 BU ) Severe liver kidney disease
